title: Walk_Posner
author: Walk_Posner
content: Sup guys. What is the best cryptopoker site in your opinion?I have been using some different, but i am sure I dont know every site... Which one is the best in your opinion? Help me out to find a new home

comments.author: Walk_Posner
comments.body: Quote from: tusandii on March 24, 2023, 06:13:14 AMQuote from: Walk_Posner on March 24, 2023, 05:12:25 AMSup guys. What is the best cryptopoker site in your opinion?I have been using some different, but i am sure I dont know every site... Which one is the best in your opinion? Help me out to find a new home I also use several gambling platforms but most actively play or bet on the Stake.com gambling platform.While joining the Stake casino, I have never experienced the slightest problem and there are many types of games or bets that can be chosen according to the preferences of gamblers.Stake has a good reputation and a large community so you don't need to worry when playing there, they even have very active support to provide services to every user.If you haven't used Stake yet, I suggest trying to play there and surely you will get satisfaction.Stake is only good for high rollers and rich people, they never have any offers or anything for normal people, you need to wagger like 1000 usd, 5000 usd atleast in ONE weak to get some offers...Stake is taking from normal people and brag that people like drake plays there.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Quote from: tusandii on March 24, 2023, 06:13:14 AMQuote from: Walk_Posner on March 24, 2023, 05:12:25 AMSup guys. What is the best cryptopoker site in your opinion?...I also use several gambling platforms but most actively play or bet on the Stake.com gambling platform.While joining the Stake casino, I have never experienced the slightest problem and there are many types of games or bets that can be chosen according to the preferences of gamblers.Stake has a good reputation and a large community so you don't need to worry when playing there, they even have very active support to provide services to every user.If you haven't used Stake yet, I suggest trying to play there and surely you will get satisfaction.You and your comments... when you are so active on Stake tell me do they have poker? The answer is "No"! But they have "Video poker" and some variants of poker but it's solo (vs house) playing.QuoteThey may share the same name, but the two games are actually quite different. Video poker is played solo, rather than against other players, and you could even say that it has more in common with slots than poker. Some knowledge of poker, such as what constitutes a good hand, is still beneficial though.SwC and Betnomi are popular here on the forum. Betnomi has more active players... I play on both from time to time. If you wish to join ü¶ä Betnomi.com üîê Icarus Poker Series | Discussion Thread ‚ô†Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô£Ô∏è‚ô¶Ô∏è|1st Rnd 26-03 - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5437680.0 you are more than welcome. So maybe you can try playing in Stake and see how lucky you are in gambling. But I've never played poker at Stake so I can't say much about how it feels. Maybe other members can share their experiences.

Most of the casino has same feature that rewards more high rollers since casino is just returning part of the profit that they can get from the user itself. Only few casino offers a too good to be true promotion even for newbie and most of them incorporates it with a hard requirements.In terms of Poker game. Betnomi is the most active crypto casino here that has a strong poker community. You can try it for yourself.

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: I would throw gg poker network in the mix since you can deposit and withdraw with btc, usdt and usdc.Your money gets converted into $ when depositing and back into crypto when withdrawing. Compared to SWC you won't obviously play with crypto directly then but at least you gets 1000s of tables and tournaments with millions in guaranteed price pools, unlike to the before mentioned.Where SWC has like 150-200 players online on average (where actually 20 are playing maybe), ggpoker has like 100000 players at the same time.PS: I don't understand why stake has to be brought up all the time, OP is clearly asking for poker sites, and not casino poker..When you google crypto poker there is no mention of stake, just so you know.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: Quote from: AbuBhakar on March 24, 2023, 01:27:07 PMMost of the casino has same feature that rewards more high rollers since casino is just returning part of the profit that they can get from the user itself. Only few casino offers a too good to be true promotion even for newbie and most of them incorporates it with a hard requirements.Promotions at casinos do often offer considerable incentives for players to place bets and play more. But most such promotions do have terms and conditions that players need to fulfill before they can fully enjoy the benefits.Some promotions that are too good to be true can be a red flag, as some casinos can use such promotions as a trick to attract players and then take advantage of them. Players should always read the terms and conditions carefully before accepting any promotion and fully understand the terms and conditions associated with the promotion.That said, not all casino promotions have tough terms. Some casinos offer promotions that are relatively easy to fulfill, especially for new players who want to try out the casino.¬† But as a word of caution, players should still be careful and make sure to understand the terms and conditions associated with the promotion before accepting any promotion.Quote from: AbuBhakar on March 24, 2023, 01:27:07 PMIn terms of Poker game. Betnomi is the most active crypto casino here that has a strong poker community. You can try it for yourself.The stronger the poker community, the better it is for the growth and development of the game itself. The Betnomi poker community is solid and active and can provide many benefits to players. Many reviews say Betnomi Poker Game is the best, but now there are many new online casinos, so maybe there will be a better casino. https://cryptomaniaks.com/betnomi-review

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Really it depends on the type of poker you are looking for. If you are looking to play video poker then Betcoin.ag, Americas cardroom, and possibly stake. If you are looking fort actual poker(no limit and limit hold em), then there is Betnomi, SwC, Betcoin.ag, and Americas Cardroom( a.k.a. ACR). Americas cardroom lets you deposit in btc and gives you a fiat balance, but you can wd in btc as well. Probably offers the most games daily IMO.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Others have given their views and suggestions and I will also do mine but before I give my suggestion, I will also say you are one the person who's in a good position to choose what you looking for because has you said, you have been playing poker games in different casinos site which means you know the ones that are good and the ones that are bad. So go back to those casinos and select from there as well.That is not withstanding, you can check the some of these site to flush.com, stake.com, Trustdice, BC.games.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: maydna on March 24, 2023, 11:31:55 AMI tried to check the poker games in my Stake account and found the poker games. Is this what you are looking for @OP?To play poker against the house isn't really poker... the rules are different, and the main problem I see in that kind of poker game is the fact that you can't go all in just like in a normal poker table.In this kind of games, you place your bet and then the dealer shows you the hand, and that's something that I don't like at all because one of the best things of poker is the fact that users should be able to decide if bet on their hands or fold them knowing the cards.And for this reason, the poker that you show us mydna is a bad joke for a true poker player.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: Walk_Posner on March 24, 2023, 05:12:25 AMSup guys. What is the best cryptopoker site in your opinion?I have been using some different, but i am sure I dont know every site... Which one is the best in your opinion? Help me out to find a new home ^It is already given above the suggestion of the site but people give random suggestions because they don't know which feature is what you are looking for. Each f us has a different type of choosing a poker site but for me, as long as I read very carefully the TOS that is fine for me and I know already them even without actually having the experience with them. The feature could be, fast transactions and a wide variety of modes of payment and of course, there is a rake back and other bonuses that could we benefit when we are running out of balance.

comments.author: danadc
comments.body: All these are good options, but considering that there is interest in poker, which crypto casino can you find poker where there are pvp matches? because playing against the house is very difficult to win, and anyone who says that it is not like that, I think that if it is like that, it is very different to play human vs. human than human vs. computer or machine, we as humans have the tendency to make plays that they tend to risk or tend to take care of the balance, on the other hand a machine or computer knows the card that is coming and with respect to that it plays to win, that is the advantage that I see, I don't know if I'm wrong.
